Functions
MiniMapContructor Configure the object to listen for its addition to the display list, so we can query parent container info.
initInit Break out calls to the primary construction mechanics of the object.
BuildContainerPrimary method of building the actual graphical elements and positioning everything appropriately.
BuildChildrenBuild the child elements we’re going to use for map display
BuildChildrenNoScaleBuild the child elements exactly how the object has been configured
BuildChildrenScaleNumber
BuildChildrenScaleSize
debugSpam some debug output and force-set the map to be visible
roomConnection
setMapData
